meanings.definition: Try hard to do or achieve something.
meanings.sent1: She was endeavoring to finish her homework before dinner.
meanings.sent2: He is always endeavoring to improve his basketball skills.
meanings.sent3: The cat was endeavoring to catch the laser pointer's elusive dot.
meanings.sent4: The seedling was endeavoring to break through the hard soil to reach the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The little girl was endeavoring to reach the cookie jar on the top shelf.

meanings.definition: Make an effort to achieve a goal.
meanings.sent1: The team is endeavoring to win the championship this season.
meanings.sent2: They are endeavoring to raise enough funds for the charity event.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel was endeavoring to reach the bird feeder hanging high in the tree.
meanings.sent4: The river was endeavoring to carve a path through the rocky terrain.
meanings.sent5: The student was endeavoring to memorize all the multiplication tables for the test.
